projects: [{"title":"Education Demographics in US Post-Secondary Institutions | Course Project, HSO201A | Mentor: Prof. S.K. Mathur","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"Analyzed the various enrollment trends in the Post-Secondary institutions of the US using deep learning methodologies.Used the Functional and Sub-classing APIs from Keras to create custom Neural Networks consisting of stacked Bidirectional RNN and LSTM layers, using them to train on time-series data for making future predictions on the enrollment trends of the different ethnic and socioeconomic groups.Applied Custom Training Loops and Custom Callbacks to get optimum performance on training and validation data.Implemented Sliding Windows Algorithm to manipulate Input data to feed it into our model for forecasting purposes."},{"title":"Artificial Neural Networks | Programming Club | IIT Kanpur","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Implemented several state-of-the-art algorithms of Deep Learning and worked on different kinds of Neural Networks further using them for tasks such as Sentiment Analysis, Image Classification and Language Translation.Learnt important Python libraries like Pytorch and Tensorflow and used them to create several successful Neural Network architectures."},{"title":"ML Kaggle | Programming Club | IIT Kanpur ","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Worked on several Machine Learning algorithms and used them for predicting future sales, predicting house prices based on other features, and created a Person of Interest Identifier based on financial and email data of the Enron scandal.Participated successfully in a global Kaggle competition based on Time Series Forecasting."}]
